[VPSNINE](https://www.vpsnine.com) is a virtualization company specializing in linux VPS Hosting. Offering high quality VPS's with professional support.

Currently offering 30% off with promo code LET1215 for the following locations: Singapore, Auckland New Zealand, Cape Town South Africa, New York City USA and Zurich Switzerland.

Host your Singapore VPS with us and enjoy the best possible reliability, speeds and peering in the Asian region. We host our services at Internap, one of the best connected data centeres in Singapore. Internap provides optimized routes to Southeast Asia, Australia and China and have preferred interconnection options with Equinix, Keppel Digihub, KDDI and GlobalSwitch.

For NYC we are located in the same data center building as Google New York.

Custom OpenVZ VPS from $7 with our 30% discount code LET1215  
256MB RAM, 30GB Disk, 400GB Bandwidth, 1 Core  
[Order Now](https://www.vpsnine.com/forms/form0.php?pid=46)  

For more details on our locations see [https://www.vpsnine.com/hosting/locations.php](https://www.vpsnine.com/hosting/locations.php)

Pay via Paypal, BitCoin, Skrill, Perfect Money, OKPay or Payza

**14 Day Moneyback Guarantee**
If your unhappy with our service for any reason at all within 14 days we'll refund your money! No questions asked. Just log a billing ticket requesting a refund with a breif reason just so we know what we did wrog.
